Nerangs.ab: pas čahār yaθā ahū vairiiō ḫᵛāndan yaθā ahū vairiiō avval ḫᵛāndan tā š́iiaoθananąm yekbār hum va urvarān kuftan aŋhə̄uš yekbār kuftan mazdā̊ yekbār kuftan xšaθrəmca ahurāi ā yim darəɤubiiō vāstārəm ḫᵛāndan čahār angušt daste az hāvan ǧodā kardan pas yaθā ahū vairiiō dovvom be š́iiaoθananąm do bār kuftan aŋhə̄uš do bār kuftan mazdā̊ do bār kuftan xšaθrəmcā tā sar ḫāndan yaθā ahū vairiiō seivom be š́iiaoθnanąm se bār kuftan be aŋhə̄uš se bār kuftan va se bār kuftan xšaθrəmcā tā sar ḫᵛāndan yaθā ahū vairiiō čahārom tā vāstārəm kuftan va hāvan šekāftan

"Then he should recite four Yaθā ahū vairiiō. He should recite the first Yaθā ahū vairiiō until š́iiaoθananąm, when he should pound (the hum and urvarān) once; at aŋhə̄uš he should pound them once; at mazdā̊ he should pound them once; at xšaθrəmca he should pound them once. He should recite ahurāi ā yim darəγubiiō vāstārəm and lift the pestle four fingers from the hāvan. During the second Yaθā ahū vairiiō, he should pound them at š́iiaoθananąm twice; at aŋhə̄uš he should pound them twice; at mazdā̊ he should pound them twice; at xšaθrəmca he should pound them twice. He should recite it until the end. During the third Yaθā ahū vairiiō, he should pound them at š́iiaoθananąm thrice; at aŋhə̄uš he should pound them thrice; at mazdā̊ he should pound them thrice; at xšaθrəmca he should pound them thrice. He should recite it until the end. During the fourth Yaθā ahū vairiiō until vāstārəm he should pount (them) and hit the hāvan."
